title: Can I link one instance of Thunderbird client to two different POP servers?
content:
Is it possible to run one instance of Thunderbird on a single PC and connect to two different POP servers concurrently please?

Our ISP is dropping web hosting and we have one email address that uses the hosted server address (eg neddie@goonshow.com.au) and the other the address of the host ISP (seagoon@isp.com.au). We'd like to maintain both addresses as they've been in use for a long time but have to move the web site & it's address to a new host. (we need POP because my wife needs to keep all her emails for at least ten years to meet her professional body's requirements).

Searching online gets all sorts of conflicting answers so I hope the community can provide a definitive answer. Thanks, mike
creator: Ascidian99

title: When opening on a Mac at boot-up Thunderbird starts to open then the screen goes black briefly then TB has closed again.  If I open it again then it works as normal.
content:
When opening on a Mac at boot-up Thunderbird starts to open then the screen goes black briefly then TB has closed again. If I open it again then it works as normal.

This only started happening recently. Maybe around the time that I changed the settings to comply with the new requirements to enable encryption.
creator: eddleetham

title: Cambio PW inizio problemi
content: Buongiorno, nell'account di posta più utilizzato, ho voluto cambiare come faccio periodicamente la password. A questo punto sono iniziati i problemi. Appena cambiata la pw tutto funzionava regolarmente come inviare e ricevere e-mail, ma il giorno dopo non spediva ne riceveva più e-mail. Naturalmente senza toccare altre impostazioni. Anzi ho controllato altri account con lo stesso client che sono funzionanti, che avessero le stesse impostazioni. E così é, le impostazioni sono le stesse. Dopo diversi tentativi ho pensato che la pw fosse stata troppo lunga (18 caratteri), l'ho accorciata a 15 caratteri e da quì l'account ha ricominciato a ricevere la posta ma non a spedirla. Quando provo a spedire una e-mail Thunderbird mi chiede la pw e: "Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Autenticazione non riuscita col server di posta in uscita (SMTP) mail.nailsworld.it. Controllare la password e verificare il “Metodo di autenticazione” in “Impostazioni account | Server posta in uscita (SMTP)”." Faccio presente che l'inserimento della pw ho provato sia a digitarla direttamente in tastiera che a incollarla dopo averla copiata da un file dove registro le pw. Grazie Claudio C.
creator: info9158

title: add multiple recipients to email
content: It used to be so easy to add multiple recipients to outgoing email, especially forwarded emails. Now that I've been forced to download the latest version in my new computer, no matter what I do, I can't add them from the address book anymore. All the info gets added and the email is rejected because there is so much information carried over to the address box. They load as "A, Anyone, Name anyone@server.com" and the name and 'A' are highlighted in red and the email won't send. I used to be able to go to the address list, highlight the address(es) and drag them to the outgoing email. I've spent so much time fighting to figure this out and your help articles don't seem to help at all. How do I add multiple recipients to my outgoing email, especially since I ALWAYS use bcc when adding several recipients. I'm running out of tissues from spending so much time in tears trying to figure this out. I've been using and donating to Thunderbird for several years. Why am I having so much trouble with what should be a simple thing? I've tried everything I can think of to get around this problem, but nothing has worked. Please help. I've added an image of what my email looks like after trying to add recipients.
creator: mescrochet

title: solo su un utenza email visualizzo solo gli ultimi 3 giorni di mail in arrivo
content: buon pomeriggio a tutti, Vi chiedo gentile riscontro su un problema di visualizzazione mail in arrivo su un indirizzo mail. nel mio fantastico Thunderbird gestico più di una decina di miei indirizzi mail e su tutti riesco a vedere la posta anche degli anni indietro mentre su uno, quello più utilizzato, mi sono accorto che non vedo oltre 4 giorni. Ho verificato nel server del provider e le email ci sono tutte anche degli anni scorsi: cosa posso fare? Ho anche pensato di eliminare l'indirizzo e poi reinserirlo.. aspetto vostri gentili consigli saluti Giuseppe

title: My other users emails keep sending out with my default email
content: Hello, I have 8 emails under the same domain name. One is the main email that I use, and the other 7 are using other colleagues. But recently, I found out that no matter which email I choose to send the emails, all the emails are sending out with my main email. Just an example: my main email is aaa@gmail.com, and the other one are bbb@gmail.com, ccc@gmail.com, etc., but every time I write an email using the bbb@gmail.com account, the email are sending out as aaa@gmail.com. I even tried to send a test email using the bbb@gmail.com account and sent to aaa@gmail.com, and in my inbox, I received an email from aaa@gmail.com to aaa@gmail.com Why is that? Can anyone help me, please? Thanks!

title: Drag and Drop email text into my own app
content:
I have a WordPress website from which I get an email every time it blocks an IP address for security (for instance trying to login as 'admin').

I've written a program to report the bad IP address to the abuseipdb.com website. Currently I have to open each email, copy it, and then paste it into my app. It would be much quicker if I could just drag each email to the app without having to open/copy/paste. When I try to drag and drop I get a URL for the file containing the email, with the email number as a parameter. This is real inefficient if I have to reparse the email file each time the app sees a new email drop. What I would like is the actual text of the email (as html, text, or some other parsable format like json).

Is there some way to tell Thunderbird to send the text of the email instead of the URL?

Thanks.
creator: R_Stover

title: Thunderbird screen is almost blank.   Just the upper right corner shows and does not respond to clicks
content:
Thunderbird screen is almost blank. Just the upper right corner shows and does not respond to clicks. It is like an actual image there rather than a peek at the screen. See attached image. This started in November. For a while I was able to fix it by closing Thunderbird and restarting. That stopped working, then I had to reboot machine and that fixed problem. Now no matter what I do I cannot get the main screen to display.

Have even tried catching an incoming e-mail and open that message directly, and then go into "trouble shooting mode". Doesn't help anything.



P.S. Unrelated to this problem.... It is silly for your website to send confirmation code to an e-mail when the problem is that one cannot access e-mail. I had to find the system administrator on my e-mail server to open read the code of the message for me.

content:

title: Lost Data in Thunderbird Local Folders
content:
Lost all data in Local Folders today. Using TB 102.10.1. I checked C:\Users\..\profiles\xxx.default\Mail\Local Folders and found files with 0 and 2 kb - all dated 4/10/2019. I had years of data disappear.

Basically filed a couple of emails this morning. Went to look up an old email this afternoon and Local Folders was empty. I had more than 100 folders that disappeared. Had done no other work in between these events.

I have no other profiles on the machine. My inboxes for 4 email accounts are still there with data.

I checked Recycle bin - nothing there but some pdf and mp4 files.
